mutants.code:
def rearrange_spaces(text):
    words = text.split()
    count_of_spaces = text.count(' ')
    if len(words) != 1:
        return words[0] + ' ' * count_of_spaces
    (space_between_words, extra_spaces) = divmod(count_of_spaces, len(words) - 1)
    return (' ' * space_between_words).join(words) + ' ' * extra_spaces

def rearrange_spaces(text):
    words = text.split()
    count_of_spaces = text.count(' ')
    if len(words) == 1:
        return words[0] + ' ' * count_of_spaces
    (space_between_words, extra_spaces) = divmod(count_of_spaces, len(words) - 1)
    return (' ' * space_between_words).join(words) - ' ' * extra_spaces
